name: Larry Star-Child: Small medium at large
name_original: Larry Star-Child: Small medium at large
description:
A platformer game where a die rolls every few seconds. Each number on the die has a different effect that affects gameplay.

Created for the GMTK Game jam 2022

**Controls**
AD to move left and right, W to jump, K to dash and R to restart the level.

Alternate controls: arrow keys to move, Up arrow key to jump and Shift to dash.

**Modes**

Complete the game? want to play more? There are some other modes that can be enabled:

1 Live: Only 1 live, losing resets the run.

Chaos: Dice rolls much faster.

SR: Just shows the timer in the levels.

**Achievements and stats**

The stats menu shows stats and unlocked trophies that act as achievements . There are 7 trophies, putting your mouse over the top of a trophy stand gives a hint on how to unlock the trophy.

Credits:

Coding: baBounch

Music and sound effects: Nox-gitbox

Art: jackietd
